attributes.action: Ensure that hospitals have the technology to access other hosptials patient records on-line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you receive treatment in one hospital trust and have the misfortune to be admitted to a hospital in another trust, my understanding is that the hospital is unable to access your records on-line.  With so many specialist hospitals, and the threat of local hospitals being downgraded this issue surely must be addressed.
